trans-unit.source: Marks an interface as a local service interface.
trans-unit.target: Marca uma interface como uma interface de serviço local.
Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!WARNING] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A class that implements a local service interface must be added to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService> and can be used by <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: > [!WARNING] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Uma classe que implementa uma interface de serviço local tem de ser adicionada aos <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService>e pode ser utilizada pelos <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity>e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService>

trans-unit.source: Events on interfaces that are attributed with ExternalDataExchangeAttribute should have event data that derive from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Eventos em interfaces de com ExternalDataExchangeAttribute devem ter dados de eventos que derivem de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataEventArgs>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: While generic types are supported for interface method and event declarations, generic types are not supported for the interface declaration itself.
trans-unit.target: Embora os tipos genéricos são suportados para as declarações de método e eventos de interface, tipos genéricos não são suportados para a declaração de interface em si.

trans-unit.source: The following interface would not be valid for use as an `ExternalDataExchange`.
trans-unit.target: A interface seguinte não será válida para utilização como um `ExternalDataExchange`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute"></xref>.
